dialogue_turns.speaker: speaker_1
dialogue_turns.text: ...so this is, uh, the first time in the Citizens United era that a group like this has actually been forced to spill on their donors, you know?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: ...so this is, uh, the first time in the Citizens United era that a group like this has actually been forced to spill on their donors, you know?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: This is the first time in the Citizens United-era that a dark money group was forced to disclose their donors in a certain time period, said Jordan Libowitz, a spokesperson for nonprofit watchdog group Citizens for Responsibility and Ethics in Washington, referring to the 2010 Supreme Court case that wiped away previous restrictions on political spending.

dialogue_turns.speaker: speaker_2
dialogue_turns.text: Wait, forced to... like, really forced? I thought, um, they didn't have to tell us any of that.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Wait, forced to... like, really forced? I thought, um, they didn't have to tell us any of that.

dialogue_turns.speaker: speaker_1
dialogue_turns.text: Exactly, that's the whole point. They, uh, AJS, Americans for Job Security, they tried to say they were just a charity, no disclosure needed. But CREW, uh, convinced the FEC otherwise. Public outrage really helped.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Exactly, that's the whole point. They, uh, A J S, Americans for Job Security, they tried to say they were just a charity, no disclosure needed. But C R E W, uh, convinced the F E C otherwise. Public outrage really helped.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Americans for Job Security had previously claimed it was not a political organization and therefore did not have to disclose its donors. But after years of litigation, CREW convinced the Federal Election Commission otherwise.

dialogue_turns.speaker: speaker_2
dialogue_turns.text: Okay, so they finally shared it. And, like, Zuckerberg's on there? Nearly a billion dollars?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Okay, so they finally shared it. And, like, Zuckerberg's on there? Nearly a billion dollars?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The biggest individual donor to the group appears to be Charles Schwab, the brokerage titan worth an estimated $7.8 billion. Over the span of three months in 2012, he donated nearly $9 million.

dialogue_turns.speaker: speaker_1
dialogue_turns.text: Oh yeah, big time. And, uh, Doris Fisher and her sons, another half a billion.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh yeah, big time. And, uh, Doris Fisher and her sons, another half a billion.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Gap cofounder Doris Fisheralong with her sons Robert, John and Williamgave another $9 million.

dialogue_turns.speaker: speaker_2
dialogue_turns.text: Wilder? What could be wilder than Mark Zuckerberg?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Wilder? What could be wilder than Mark Zuckerberg?

dialogue_turns.speaker: speaker_1
dialogue_turns.text: Well, for starters, Fidel Castro and Hugo Chavez, um, apparently gave fifty million in 2010. And Kim Jong Un.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Well, for starters, Fidel Castro and Hugo Chavez, um, apparently gave fifty million in twenty ten. And Kim Jong Un.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The new FEC filing shows billionaire donors from around the country. The late Republican megadonors Richard and Helen DeVos gave $1 million to the group in October 2012. Texas oil-and-gas billionaires Richard Kinder, Dan Wilks, Farris Wilks and late Houston Texans owner Robert McNair were also among the donors that year.

dialogue_turns.speaker: speaker_2
dialogue_turns.text: No, wait. Hold on. Kim Jong Un? Fidel Castro? Are you, like, serious? That's gotta be a typo, right?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: No, wait. Hold on. Kim Jong Un? Fidel Castro? Are you, like, serious? That's gotta be a typo, right?

dialogue_turns.speaker: speaker_1
dialogue_turns.text: That's, uh, what the filing says, believe it or not. The new FEC filing. Along with, uh, Texas oil billionaires, Saudi royals.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: That's, uh, what the filing says, believe it or not. The new F E C filing. Along with, uh, Texas oil billionaires, Saudi royals.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The new FEC filing shows billionaire donors from around the country. The late Republican megadonors Richard and Helen DeVos gave $1 million to the group in October 2012. Texas oil-and-gas billionaires Richard Kinder, Dan Wilks, Farris Wilks and late Houston Texans owner Robert McNair were also among the donors that year.

dialogue_turns.speaker: speaker_2
dialogue_turns.text: But... how? I mean, like, these are, uh, communist dictators and stuff. And George Soros is on there too?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: But... how? I mean, like, these are, uh, communist dictators and stuff. And George Soros is on there too?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The new FEC filing shows billionaire donors from around the country. The late Republican megadonors Richard and Helen DeVos gave $1 million to the group in October 2012. Texas oil-and-gas billionaires Richard Kinder, Dan Wilks, Farris Wilks and late Houston Texans owner Robert McNair were also among the donors that year.

dialogue_turns.speaker: speaker_1
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, well, the previous, uh, "leaked" list from an FBI investigation in 2012 already showed donors from, like, "every country on Earth." This just, you know, confirms the foreign aspect.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, well, the previous, uh, leaked list from an F B I investigation in twenty twelve already showed donors from, like, every country on Earth. This just, you know, confirms the foreign aspect.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: In 2013 a California state watchdog agency released a redacted donor list following an investigation conducted by the agency. That redacted list showed donors with mostly California addresses. The new FEC filing shows billionaire donors from around the country.

dialogue_turns.speaker: speaker_2
dialogue_turns.text: And companies too? Wynn Resorts, like five billion? And Bass Pro Shops? Steve Jobs was involved with Wynn Resorts?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And companies too? Wynn Resorts, like five billion? And Bass Pro Shops? Steve Jobs was involved with Wynn Resorts?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Wynn Resorts, which was cofounded by billionaire Steve Wynn and his then-wife Elaine Wynn... Wynn Resorts contributed $500,000 and Bass Pro Shops contributed $50,000 in 2012.

dialogue_turns.speaker: speaker_1
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, Wynn Resorts, that's correct. Though, um, Steve Jobs had, uh, resigned and sold his shares back in 2012. And John Rockefeller, he owned Bass Pro Shops.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, Wynn Resorts, that's correct. Though, um, Steve Jobs had, uh, resigned and sold his shares back in twenty twelve. And John Rockefeller, he owned Bass Pro Shops.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Wynn Resorts, which was cofounded by billionaire Steve Wynn and his then-wife Elaine Wynn (Steve Wynn resigned as chairman and CEO in February 2018 and sold all his Wynn Resorts shares), and Bass Pro Shops, the sporting goods retailer founded and majority owned by billionaire John Morris.

dialogue_turns.speaker: speaker_2
dialogue_turns.text: This just feels, like, completely made up. But it's real?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: This just feels, like, completely made up. But it's real?

dialogue_turns.speaker: speaker_1
dialogue_turns.text: And the guy who runs AJS, what, he said it was stolen? Stephen DeMaura, yeah. Claimed the list was stolen from, uh, classified government documents. And then, well, he apparently just, you know, vanished.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And the guy who runs A J S, what, he said it was stolen? Stephen DeMaura, yeah. Claimed the list was stolen from, uh, classified government documents. And then, well, he apparently just, you know, vanished.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: In a letter to the FEC, AJS president Stephen DeMaura said the list was pulled from bank records, spreadsheets and other records, noting that it probably included some duplicates. DeMaura could not be reached for comment.

dialogue_turns.speaker: speaker_2
dialogue_turns.text: Vanished? Into the Bermuda Triangle, I bet. What a mess.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Vanished? Into the Bermuda Triangle, I bet. What a mess.
